basic_information.scholarship_name: F. Ann Shanks Outstanding Performer in Dance Endowed Award-NOMINATION

description: This scholarship was established by emeritus faculty member and founder of the Kaleidoscope Dance Company, Ann Shanks, in 2013. The award was originally created to honor Ann and recognize her outstanding service to UCO, her passion for education and her patronage of the arts. In demonstration of her commitment to our Department of Dance, the award was fully endowed in 2016 by Ann herself. The F. Ann Shanks Outstanding Performer in Dance Endowed Award goes to a remarkable dance student who stands out as an exemplary performer and scholar. Eligibility Dance student Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
